title: Stylish Drop Cap Technique
description: In this lab, we will learn about the Drop Cap technique in CSS. Drop Cap is a typographic technique used to add visual appeal to the first letter of the first paragraph. Through this lab, you will understand how to use the :first-child selector and the ::first-letter pseudo-element to style the first letter of a paragraph in a unique and eye-catching way.

meta.title: CSS Drop Cap Tutorial | Typographic Design
meta.description: Learn the CSS Drop Cap technique to add visual appeal to the first letter of the first paragraph. Explore the use of :first-child selector and ::first-letter pseudo-element.
meta.keywords: CSS, Drop Cap, Typographic Design, :first-child, ::first-letter, Paragraph Styling, Web Development

i18n.title: 时尚的首字下沉技术
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将学习CSS中的首字下沉技术。首字下沉是一种排版技术，用于为第一段的首字母增添视觉吸引力。通过本实验，你将了解如何使用:first-child选择器和::first-letter伪元素，以独特且引人注目的方式为段落的首字母设置样式。
